Case Studies 2024: Turning Challenges into Opportunities


At BARBUSS, we help the risk industry to improve results through innovative approaches and proven expertise.

From navigating cyber-attacks and resolving complex environmental losses to developing groundbreaking financial solutions and handling unique challenges like grape logistics and copper transit, we turn obstacles into opportunities.

d resolving complex environmental losses to developing groundbreaking financial solutions and handling unique challenges like grape logistics and copper transit, we turn obstacles into opportunities. We handle hundreds of cases annually, showcasing our expertise and commitment to transparency and knowledge sharing by highlighting those that demonstrate innovation and the exceptional skills of our professionals.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FZMz_CDJmnfjjWN5SmIzSjzkeD%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161355672%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wJ12WcR%2BF%2FA%2FtRgwpdKkxuz9QgufyYrRL3qBQrsFOYA%3D&reserved=0> 	
Groundbreaking Financial Solutions

By Joaquín Sarmiento Laspiur
Witness the power of innovation in finance. BARBUSS CAPITAL, where boundaries are to be pushed, and opportunities are waiting to be embraced.

Meticulous analysis, precision and efficiency, unlocking the potential in each case, opening the way for a revolutionary proposal.

 
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FVoYyCE6noU11zV3UYSmS7WbVT%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161375578%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1w%2BVcCXTSAnKYp3sCmhtfN%2BnRc7t2sfbKUVUH5DszSk%3D&reserved=0> 	
When Cargo Claims Go Bananas
 
By Jerónimo D'Almeida
In this case study, we discuss the transportation of bananas from Ecuador to USA by sea and the challenges encountered during the trip that ended up in a cargo claim issue.

s
 
By Jerónimo D'Almeida
In this case study, we discuss the transportation of bananas from Ecuador to USA by sea and the challenges encountered during the trip that ended up in a cargo claim issue.

The cargo, transported in three containers, was exposed to high temperatures during transit, resulting in damages and a delay in resolving the claim.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FXqYeCGQpqSWWPK1fRTqSBlG8j%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161389841%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2FlLJ1l4ahqE%2F%2BRO4IArZLXoCryC4mmjno8CsDewNrSk%3D&reserved=0> 	
Grappling with delay

By Delfina La Grotteria
A shipment of fresh grapes from Chile to China faced an 18-day delay during transit, despite careful preparation. Although the containers and storage were in good condition, temperature increased after discharge so it raised concerns about the grapes' quality. The shipper filed a claim against the carrier for damages and delay, resulting in a partial compensation offer out of the amount claimed. 
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F3RKNCJ7vwfpp23qf0UPSyrzvm%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161402959%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rG5o9SaGaJG%2Fl1eU35m0boYOzQtWh8J00FZCgCfFFR4%3D&reserved=0> 	
Commute Chaos

Zsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rG5o9SaGaJG%2Fl1eU35m0boYOzQtWh8J00FZCgCfFFR4%3D&reserved=0> 	
Commute Chaos

By Maximiliano Franzani, Gastón Guzman and Diego Vallejos
The new Ruling 39140-2024, issued by Chile's Superintendence of Social Security, represents a paradigm shift in understanding work-related accidents. It recognizes injuries suffered during a robbery as part of the work-related commute or In Itinere accidents. This ruling challenges conventional notions because it highlights the close connection between work duties and the hazards faced during travel, redefining the boundaries of insurance coverage and claims adjustment. 
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F7fY1CK5wxU88Yz2i5cDS5gVpy%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161416236%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gplx7pCOuYgAX0eOIcVu%2BtLTkze13bGXkutHpv6rTSQ%3D&reserved=0> 	
The Freed Dolphin’s Mystery

By Tomás Appleyard
This case study relates to the damages to a mooring structure (dolphin) allegedly caused by a berthed cruise ship during a Hurricane Warning. The incident took place at the Port of Dos Bocas, Mexico. The mooring structure was displaced, halting operations for over three weeks. 
Mysteriously, the ship exhibited no damage to her hull or signs of striking.

Mysteriously, the ship exhibited no damage to her hull or signs of striking. 
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FUyqPCL5xyUNNgyRtvf3Sy98C1%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161428648%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=qskmKhfUwNCXsntP7Nzd%2FDEralRnXPDCwpgedFhaMW4%3D&reserved=0> 	
Don’t Let Your Cargo Melt Away!

By Francisco Elizalde, Julieta Ferro, Jerónimo D'Almeida and Nicolás Mateo
An ice cream shipment from Cape Town, South Africa, to South Carolina, USA, did not proceed as planned due to a refrigeration unit malfunction while the cargo was under the shipment company. So they imposed a liability limitation of 2 SDR/Kg according to contractual terms. However, upon reviewing the contract details, it was found that the Carriage of Goods by Sea Act (COGSA) applied a higher limitation for shipments to the USA.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FeyziCM5yzUxxLMqHxhzS8b8UB%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161441012%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zJ%2BJZwfuW4QIiqEjVJ5jeDRXHDdlC8jl8MYBx1BZ6zc%3D&reserved=0> 	
The Copper Connection
 
By Martina Beverati, Brenda Szmulewicz, Octavio Nicolas Piccolomini, Maximo Alejandro Moroni, and Dolores Mora.

zJ%2BJZwfuW4QIiqEjVJ5jeDRXHDdlC8jl8MYBx1BZ6zc%3D&reserved=0> 	
The Copper Connection
 
By Martina Beverati, Brenda Szmulewicz, Octavio Nicolas Piccolomini, Maximo Alejandro Moroni, and Dolores Mora. 
In this case, the opponent denied their liability by arguing that the evidence provided was insufficient and that the insurance policy did not cover the company that was reimbursed by our client, an insurance company.
This reimbursement was for the actual harmed party due to a loss in a complicated jurisdiction (China).
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F08KFCN5zAUVVQD0sGiVSyOOL0%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161453589%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1sRmdhNasunoBbHkat%2Ftf68zw3chADry6DoEhHH9QpE%3D&reserved=0> 	
Two and a Half Claim
 
By Joaquín Sarmiento Laspiur
A Middle Eastern client faced high costs to arbitrate a millionaire maritime cargo damage claim. BARBUSS CLAIMS and BARBUSS CAPITAL joined forces, financing the arbitration in exchange for a percentage of the net result. This collaboration removed the financial barrier and enabled the claim to proceed.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2Fy4dlCO5ABU55gzpS7sDSGivek%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161466932%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=P%2FQnQBgpBnramr%2FFMX6hmBI28woFVglpQ08%2B%2BdT5tks%3D&reserved=0> 	
Fasten Your Seat Belts and Navigate Through Financial Solutions
 
By Maximiliano Romero Àlvarez
Facing economic instability in Argentina, a major reinsurer partnered with BARBUSS RUN OFF to tackle rising inflation and interest rates.

e Through Financial Solutions
 
By Maximiliano Romero Àlvarez
Facing economic instability in Argentina, a major reinsurer partnered with BARBUSS RUN OFF to tackle rising inflation and interest rates. Through a meticulous audit and aggressive settlement strategy, the team successfully reduced the client's economic exposure, showcasing their expertise in managing complex market challenges.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FRf6vCP5BDUvv28KhqtxSxHV9M%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161480319%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=amBXRim33SaMUOSYpl07%2BeNxfPymhdhGyWJ0EyRi%2Bmc%3D&reserved=0> 	
Recovering Environmental Losses
 
By Yuri Agamenon Silva
After a persistent legal battle, BARBUSS secured a victory against a public water supply concessionaire. The company was condemned for poor sewage management, causing leaks that affected the community. The court ruled in favor of strict liability, now awaiting the appeal judgment.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FfeamCQ5DEUBBKMkTWuMSG1nAm%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161493850%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=0dBZ2J4mqnjNq9cqB2a3bnDBqotCYeKVQ7bOOHYuPCY%3D&reserved=0> 	
Engaging Cyber-Attacks and Container Theft

WUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=0dBZ2J4mqnjNq9cqB2a3bnDBqotCYeKVQ7bOOHYuPCY%3D&reserved=0> 	
Engaging Cyber-Attacks and Container Theft

By Jorge Entrala Rivera & Sebastián Villanueva
In a recent case involving energy drinks stolen from a Chilean terminal, our strategic approach challenged the force majeure claim, securing a favorable outcome. This case underscores the importance of security and cybersecurity in the logistics chain.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FjWy6CR5EGUnnpjvHxCQS15WNS%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161506647%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=swL8ivU4bSf031JMLfMirMQjsuUcHVLsMG9%2BQI61Uz0%3D&reserved=0> 	
Rapid Action, Strong Results

By Martina Beverati
When a barge carrying 3,637 tons of bauxite ran aground off Kamsar, Guinea, BARBUSS took immediate action. Through efficient and quick claims coordination, collateral acquisition, and persistent negotiation, a significant portion of the lost cargo's value was recovered.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FeGMNCV0LMU00ENxhBFOSES4V-%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161522401%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PQDzoTq5xCiOiOsn0DiNiPiPeWaNB6aekboV4dZxTyA%3D&reserved=0> 	
The Co-Insurance Factor

JFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PQDzoTq5xCiOiOsn0DiNiPiPeWaNB6aekboV4dZxTyA%3D&reserved=0> 	
The Co-Insurance Factor

By Brenda Szmulewicz
A unique case of co-insurance on a cargo shipment from South Korea to Chile highlights the complexities of handling claims when two insurers are involved. From a new perspective, the BARBUSS team learned how to walk through strategic negotiation and persistence to achieve success.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FXQTQCWjMNUzzQR5fYHWSo5ppk%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161540356%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=8AZ1mI8QLt0orHHO%2BcA6lZ5vKpQbcTTRd%2BdXXJtBojI%3D&reserved=0> 	
Outside the Box recovery

By Viviana Hurtado
A cargo theft incident involving a truckload of 900 cartons of cigarettes valued at over USD 300,000 has triggered a dispute between the carrier and their insurer, who denied the claim alleging fraudulent activity. Subsequently, the insurer of the stolen goods, having already paid out the claim, retained BARBUSS Claims to initiate recovery action. BARBUSS Claims discovered an alternative avenue for recovery by leveraging a financial infidelity policy.
	
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FfPwlCXkNOSBBgVXTPIASWmhIm%3Fdomain%3Dbarbuss.us8.list-manage.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccef4962b5ea8424622ab08dd3ba77af4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638732313161558217%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ISa3v9yOPeJ%2Bk%2B193CHxVSps5s63kxQRkf34O%2Bw%2FjIA%3D&reserved=0> 	
When Precision Weighs More

kiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C40000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ISa3v9yOPeJ%2Bk%2B193CHxVSps5s63kxQRkf34O%2Bw%2FjIA%3D&reserved=0> 	
When Precision Weighs More 

By Josefina Reta
In the world of international trade, issues such as bulk cargo shortages can turn into very complex legal disputes. This case refers to the combination of precise legal strategy and local knowledge that helped secure a favorable settlement. This was reached by focusing on avoiding the prolonged delays of a judicial process.
